sections.text:
81-3518.Responsible charge, defined.

Responsible charge means personal responsibility for the technical and financial aspects of geologic work through:

(1) Personal action;

(2) Management in an organization; or

(3) Direct supervision.

SourceLaws 1998, LB 1161, ยง 66;Laws 2025, LB38, ยง 15.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
